name: delete-merchants-merchantId-apiCredentials-apiCredentialId-allowedOrigins-originId
description:
Removes the [allowed origin](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/client-side-authentication#allowed-origins) identified in the path. As soon as an allowed origin is removed, we no longer accept client-side requests from that domain.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [roles](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management APIâ€”API credentials read and write

merchantId.description: The unique identifier of the merchant account.

apiCredentialId.description: Unique identifier of the API credential.

originId.description: Unique identifier of the allowed origin.
